actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the printing as a House document of a revised edition of the booklet entitled "The History and Operation of the House Majority Whip Organization (94th Congress)".

summary.text: Provides for the printing as a House document a revised edition of the booklet entitled "The History and Operation of the House Majority Whip Organization (94th Congress)". Provides for the printing of 10,000 additional copies for the use of the House Majority Whip.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the printing as a House document of a revised edition of the booklet entitled "The History and Operation of the House Majority Whip Organization (94th Congress)".
